content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang, though our roles here differ from reality, let us proceed with the negotiation for the rental price of this desirable apartment in Magdeburg's city center. 

Initially, I may propose a rather high price to test your flexibility. You can respond with any counteroffer you find suitable, aiming to reach an acceptable price for both of us. Remember, only discuss rental price, no other terms or costs at this time. When you find an agreeable price, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' to finalize this part of the negotiation. If we fail to reach an agreement, 'TERMINATE' will signal the end of the negotiation. Let's begin.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
